Patterns for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources (PR-NOR)
• PR-NORs define a procedure that transforms the non-
ontological resource components into ontology 
g

gy
representational primitives. 
• These patterns will generate the ontologies at a 
conceptualization level, independent of the ontology 
implementation language.
